artist: Artist: Warren MacKenzie; Artist: Alix Kolesky MacKenzie, American
creditline: Gift of Jane B. and Martin E. Abel, from the estate of Dr. Samuel and Edith K. Beirstein
description: round bulbous body with attached round hollow handle and protruding lip; half of interior/exterior brownish green; other half on interior/exterior (with handle) grey
markings: on exterior, at bottom edge below handle, stamped: [(intertwined initials)]
title: Sauce or gravy server
